dieterdietz.org is a platform offering services in the field of architecture, media and urban design. Its structure is not hierarchized around persons but projects. Collaborators are therefore always co-authors.

 

We conceive of architecture as a discipline with accentuated responsibility towards society and the environment: We therefore engage in pointedly open and holistic processes in all our projects. This challenge we live and share with our clients, as well as with partners and citizens.

 

Our open research environment ensures the fertilization of ideas across disciplines, projects and collaborators. As a solid foundation for the quality of projects at all scales and in all phases clients, collaborators and projects benefit from the knowhow and the infrastructure of a professional architectural practice and the ties to the research and teaching environment at EPFL.

 

We believe that excellence in design must be paired with common benefit.
